SEARCH
Package entities

Class Branch

java.lang.Object
entities.Branch
public class Branch extends Object
The Branch class encapsulates the attributes and contains the methods for operations related to Branches

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private int
    calculateMinManagers()
    The private method to calculate the minimum number of managers possible for the branch given the number of staff in this branch According to the rules given in the task sheet: 1-4 staffs = 1 manager 5-8 staffs = 2 managers 9-15 staffs = 3 managers

    • toString

      public String toString()
      The overridden toString() class that prints the branch name with location e.g. NTU(North spine Plaza)
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • calculateMinManagers

      private int calculateMinManagers()
      The private method to calculate the minimum number of managers possible for the branch given the number of staff in this branch According to the rules given in the task sheet: 1-4 staffs = 1 manager 5-8 staffs = 2 managers 9-15 staffs = 3 managers
      Returns:
      the min number of managers allowed

    • incrementStaffCount

      public void incrementStaffCount() throws ExceededBranchQuotaException
      The method to increment the number of staff in this branch. The method also updates the minimum allowed managers after every increment
      Throws:
      ExceededBranchQuotaException - if there are too many staff in this branch

    • incrementManagerCount

      public void incrementManagerCount() throws ExceededBranchQuotaException
      The method to increment the number of managers in this branch. Assume there is no maximum number of staff
      Throws:
      ExceededBranchQuotaException - if there are too many staff in this branch

    • decrementStaffCount

      public void decrementStaffCount() throws StaffManagementException
      The method to decrement the number of staff in this branch. The method also updates the minimum allowed managers after every decrement
      Throws:
      StaffManagementException - if the staff count is negative

    • decrementManagerCount

      public void decrementManagerCount() throws StaffManagementException
      The method to decrement the number of managers in this branch. Assume there is no minimum number of managers
      Throws:
      StaffManagementException - if the manager count is negative
      NotEnoughManagersException - if the branch does not have enough managers
